Package index

Description

riycf-package riycf
Utilities for Calculating Infant and Young Child Feeding Indicators

Breastfeeding

get_ebf()
Construct exclusive breastfeeding status for under 6 months old child
get_evbf() get_eibf() get_ebf2d() get_mixmf() get_cbf() get_bof()
Construct other breastfeeding related indicators (from IYCF)

Minimum diet

get_foodscore()
Construct the food groups consumption score (from Minimum Dietary Diversity 6-23 months (MDD))
get_mad() get_mdd()
Determining Minimum Acceptable Diet

Minimum meal frequency

get_mmf() get_mmf_bf() get_mmf_bf_6to8() get_mmf_bf_9to23() get_mmf_nonbf() get_nonbf_frq()
Determining Minimum Meal Freq
get_mmff() get_milk_frq()
Determining Minimum Milk Feeding Frequency

Minimum acceptable diet

get_mad() get_mdd()
Determining Minimum Acceptable Diet

Complementary feeding

get_isssf() get_eff() get_swb() get_ufc() get_zvf()
Construct other breastfeeding related indicators (from IYCF)

Datasets

iycfData
Infant and Young Children Indicators Sample Dataset

Utilities

get_dummy()
Construction of Dummy Variable(s)
